PHRASE.LANG: Place these butterflies all over your room and watch as they glow and flap their wings. [#Legal]
Placez ces papillons un peu partout dans la pièce et regardez-les briller et battre des ailes. [#Legal]
Wenn man diese Schmetterlinge an einer beliebigen Stelle im Raum platziert, kann man zusehen, wie sie leuchten und mit den Flügeln flattern. [#Legal]
Sistema queste farfalle nella tua stanza e guardale illuminarsi e agitare le ali. [#Legal]
Coloca estas mariposas por tu habitación y contempla como brillan y mueven las alas. [#Legal]
자신의 방을 나비들로 꾸미고, 반짝이며 날개를 펼치는 장관을 지켜 보세요. [#Legal]
Place these butterflies all over your room and watch as they glow and flap their wings. [#Legal]
將這些蝴蝶放在房間裡，讓牠們發光和翩翩起舞。[#Legal]
將這些蝴蝶放在房間裡，讓牠們發光和翩翩起舞。[#Legal]
Place these butterflies all over your room and watch as they glow and flap their wings. [#Legal]
